ValidationRule.description: Permission Control must reference only one of a Resource, or a Region, Practice, Group, or a Project, Opportunity, or Team.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISBLANK(pse__Resource__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Region__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Practice__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Group__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Project__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Opportunity__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Team__c),0,1) > 1
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select only one record for the Permission Control. Either a Resource, or a Region, Practice, Group, or a Project, Opportunity, or a Team.
